attributes.action: Invest in youth clubs for the young people of the UK!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I want to see more youth clubs for the young people of the UK, we need more money & investment from the goverment to help promote such things, i have seen a lot of youth clubs closing over the years and the increase in crime, something needs to be done. we could have camping trips, inter competitions between the clubs  etc... they could have fun and gain something from this  inc D OF E or something on those grounds....it will help push crime down in all areas, there is alot of monies being donated abroad to help other countries why not donate some of the monies to help our youth policy. (These youngsters are our future generation)
